unlimited-duration.name: Unlimited Duration
unlimited-duration.hint: Remove the duration from the Armor in Earth effect. Useful for handwaving reusing the impulse periodically during exploration.

fresh-produce.name: Fresh Produce
fresh-produce.target-outside-aura: Your current target is not inside your kinetic aura.
fresh-produce.already-eaten: {name} has already eaten Fresh Produce in the last ten minutes.

hardwood-armor.name: Hardwood Armor

unlimited-duration.name: Unlimited Duration
unlimited-duration.hint: Remove the duration from the Hardwood Armor effect. Useful for handwaving reusing the impulse periodically during exploration.

shield-prompt.title: Hardwood Armor Shield
shield-prompt.content: Would you like to create a wooden shield in your free hand?

hardwood-armor.shield-destroyed: {name}'s wooden shield was broken and has decayed.

metal-carapace.name: Metal Carapace

unlimited-duration.name: Unlimited Duration
unlimited-duration.hint: Remove the duration from the Metal Carapace effect. Useful for handwaving reusing the impulse periodically during exploration.

shield-prompt.title: Metal Carapace Shield
shield-prompt.content: Would like to create a Metal Carapace shield in your free hand?

metal-carapace.shield-destroyed: {name}'s Metal Carapace Shield was broken and has crumbled to flakes of rust.
metal-carapace.armor-destroyed: {name}'s Metal Carapace was shattered from the critical hit.

oceans-balm.immune: {name} is currently immune to healing from Ocean's Balm.

thermal-nimbus.name: Thermal Nimbus
thermal-nimbus.damage-roll-not-found: The DamageRoll class was not found, so Thermal Nimbus automation will not function.

auto-damage.name: Automatically Apply Damage
auto-damage.hint: Damage will still roll automatically, but must be applied manually.

timber-sentinel.name: Timber Sentinel

no-gamemaster.create: The Protector Tree could not be created as there is no Gamemaster present.
no-gamemaster.intercept: The Protector Tree did not intercept the Strike as there is no Gamemaster present.

timber-sentinel.take-damage: {name} intercepts the Strike and takes {damage} damage.
timber-sentinel.take-damage-destroyed: {name} intercepts the Strike, takes {damage} damage, and is destroyed.

torrent-in-the-blood.immune: {name} is currently immune to Torrent in the Blood.
